using Plots

plot(sin,

     fill=(0,:lavender))






  
    
  



  
    
  



  
    
  


























Figure 1: Parametric Plots

title: Spectrometers
text:
Code
using Plots, NPZ, Interpolations, DelimitedFiles




Code
cal_factor = npzread("data/cal_factor.npz")

plot(cal_factor[5:end-5],
    xlabel="wavelength index",
    ylabel="radiance/count (μW/m²/sr/nm)",
    xticks=0:100:1024,
    label="calibration factor")
